body.name: Aokura Kitchen Knife, Chef's Santoku Knife 5.6 Inch, Ultra-sharp German High Carbon Steel Chef Knife, Super Sharp Multipurpose Knife for Meat Vegetable Fruit with Ergonomic Handle & Eco-Box
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 2 mins
features: High-Carbon Stainless Steel Blade- It is manufactured from high-quality stainless steel that maintains its functionality for a long time. And to boost its sturdiness, the steel contains 0.6-0.75 carbon. This makes it two times as hard as other knives in its class as they contain about 0.3% carbon.

Multi-functional Knife- The gyutou knife is classified and designed to be multipurpose knife for professional applications .It cuts,dices,slices,chops and also cuts meat off bones. It comes with a HRC( Rockwell Hardness Scale) of 56-58 which makes it among the tough knives in its class.

Ergonomic Plastic Handle- To make it more professional and minimize any fatigue, finger numbness or aches after holding it continuously for an extended time the knife's handle is made from plastic material. This is material is comfort, strength and stability.

Ultra-sharp Edge- Sharpness is key to achieving the best cuts and this is evident in the knife's blade which is quite sharp and will remain this way even after tough tasks such as cutting tough meat or removing flesh from bones. The sharpness is further boosted by use of the latest Japanese engineering.

Corrosion Resistance Stainless Blade- In addition to carbon, 16-18% chrome is also included in the blade's metal composition. This gives its a glossy finish which will not tarnish even after using it for a long time, they are perfect mothers day gifts, fathers day gifts, wedding and birthday gifts.
body.description: 5.6-inch Chef knife German Steel and comfort grip handle design This is a Japanese-style kitchen knife that has been manufactured with extremely low costs and maintained reasonable quality control. It belongs to our self-owned factory brand, devoid of any brand premium. With practical packaging, it serves as a kitchen tool that we essentially gift to consumers. Highly cost-effective kitchen knives. It is our way of introducing and gaining recognition for our brand. With over 40 years of OEM manufacturing for numerous international big brands, we possess outstanding production techniques and rigorous quality control processes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This kitchen knife is a gift from us to the consumers, as its production cost exceeds its retail. Stringent quality control during production and before shipment. Cost-effective packaging to reduce expenses. 5.6-inch Chef knife German Steel and comfort grip handle design This is a Japanese-style kitchen knife that has been manufactured with extremely low costs and maintained reasonable quality control. It belongs to our self-owned factory brand, devoid of any brand premium. With practical packaging, it serves as a kitchen tool that we essentially gift to consumers. Highly cost-effective kitchen knives. It is our way of introducing and gaining recognition for our brand. With over 40 years of OEM manufacturing for numerous international big brands, we possess outstanding production techniques and rigorous quality control processes.

Classic Japanese-style kitchen knife. Good quality Sharp blade made of high-quality stainless steel. Reason packaging Cost-effective packaging, minimal cost compression, and a focus on the product to provide consumers with the best possible product at the most reasonable cost. Comfort grip Comfortable handle designed for long-term use without causing fatigue in the hand. Professional kitchen knife handle Timeless handle design that never goes out of style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the price its awesome!!!
reviews.reviewText: Okay it arrived in a thin cardboard box but once out it's a very sharp useful knife. Full tang triple rivet and very sharp. I have many knives all sizes and shapes and this knife is great for basic daily food preparation. I'm very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice shape and weight cuts well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This knife is very sharp, what I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice little chef knife. Good edge on the blade. Slices right though vegetables with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars mmm doesnt feel like a good knife
reviews.reviewText: I kept it but I initially purchased it for a present, but doesn't feel like a good quality knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent knife! Stays shape for a good long time.
reviews.reviewText: This is a kitchen knife. I call this style a chopping knife for dicing and mincing.This knife is very sharp and nicely made.The description says that it is made of “German High Carbon steel. I have never heard of that type of steel to be honest but, I will be looking for it where knives are concerned from now on. keeps an edge and stays sharp much longer and makes the job go more quickly. This knife is something I would recommend because compared to any I’ve ever used this makes it seem like I have been using a dull hatchet. It is so much better than any knife I’ve owned or used. It will cut meat with ease and chop veggies like they are butter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn't stay sharp long but easy to use and gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: This knife didn't stay sharp for long at all. Luckily, I have a good knife sharpener I can use. I didn't check the size and it is a little smaller than I expected as well. Definitely not beefy enough to get through tough stuff but will get the job done in a small kitchen as a secondary or even third kitchen knife.
